EmailTemplate.name: (sdl) Sent DocumentsLate
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Thanks for sending your verification documents. Unfortunately, they were sent too late for yesterday's shipment, so we were unable to get your order out on time. If we keep this order on Standard Shipping, you’ll receive it on XX/XX/XX. The other option is to have it shipped overnight so you get it on your original requested delivery date, XX/XX/XX. However, you would be responsible for the overnight shipping costs.
Please let me know how you’d like to move forward.
Best,
{!Case.OwnerFirstName} BorrowLenses.com Verifications Team Verify@borrowlenses.com (844) 853-6737 x4
